I am also attaching 3 copies of the application form: one for Mr Maeda,
one for your files and one you could send direct to me with a copy of your
letter to Mr Maeda, marking the original accordingly,
I do hope you agree to this suggestion and that I can look forward to
seeing you in Singapore. I am sure that you would be able to make a
valuable contribution to our work especially in the area programming as
applied to education and national development.
With warm regards to you both,
Yours sincerely,
CHARLES MOSES
Mr William G. Harley,
President,
National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
1346 Connecticut Avenue,
WASHINGTON D.C. 20036.
